fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Attempt to canonize a player at night.
- Reveal yourself as Jadwiga during the day, resurrecting all saints and giving yourself hang immunity for the day. (Costs 8 Gold +3 for each saint) (One Use, can only be used with at least one saint dead.)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If a player you attempt to canonize dies that night or the next day by any means, they will be registered as a saint. Their win condition changes to “Conquer the world through war”, may speak in the factional chat, and gain one use of their ability while dead. They do not appear as a Civilization in the graveyard, and are by all other means dead.
- You may not target the same person that is targeted by the Civ using the Factional Kill.
- If you are the last Civ alive, you automatically canonize whoever you use the Factional Kill on.
- When you reveal, you may no longer use your first ability.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
“They were slain by a Polish Winged Hussar.” (Factional Kill)
“Jadwiga has deemed you worthy! You have been canonized.” (Target when converted)
“[Player] has revealed themself as Jadwiga! All saints have been resurrected!” (Reveal)
